recipe.title: 5x Onion Salsa
ingredients: 2 leeks (white and pale green parts only), quartered lengthwise, sliced
2 teaspoons chopped fresh thyme or 3/4 teaspoon dried
2 tablespoons chopped fresh chives or green onions
instructions: Heat olive oil in heavy large skillet over medium heat. Add leeks, onion, shallots, garlic and thyme. Season with salt and pepper. Sauté until vegetables are crisp-tender, about 5 minutes. Transfer to bowl and cool.
Add mayonnaise and chives to onion mixture. Season salsa to taste with salt and pepper.
